channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Cliff Rescue; INC#1632; 11:05PM; 3740 S Meyler St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46x8AvP; #SanPedro; LAFD divers from the trio of assigned LAFD fireboats have found the heavily damaged vehicle upside down in the pounding surf, wedged between large rocks on the rugged shoreline at maximum tide. One of the two LAFD rescue helicopters is utilizing a 30 million candlepower searchlights (along with those of the fireboats) to illuminate the challenging rescue scene for the LAFD divers, who have yet to find a victim, as they relentlessly seek to gain access to the upside down vehicle, which has a collapsed roof with significant passenger space intrusion.; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E112 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA101 RA85 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Update Cliff Rescue; INC#1632; 10:57PM; 3740 S Meyler St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46x8AvP; #SanPedro; First arriving LAFD ground crews skillfully descended the steep cliff to encounter strong waist high surf at peak tide, at the base of the rocky cliffs. precluding ground based operations. LAFD divers from the trio of assigned LAFD fireboats are in the water, making their way to shore, as a pair of LAFD rescue helicopters approach the scene near Wilders Addition Park northwest of Point Fermin, as the search continues for the one vehicle reported to have driven over the (yet undetermined height) cliff. ; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA101 RA85 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Cliff Rescue; INC#1632; 10:29PM; 3740 S Meyler St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46x8AvP; #SanPedro; PRELIM: LAFD response by land, air and sea to reports of a vehicle over a cliff into the (currently high tide) surf at the rocky shore of Wilders Addition Park northwest of Point Fermin. ; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E248 E285 E48 E85 EM13 H1 H2 HA1 HA2 RA101 RA85 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown Structure Fire; INC#0831; 01:15PM; 645 N Gardner St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KCizHD; #Fairfax; 31 LAFD Firefighters took just 25 minutes in largely defensive operations, to access, confine and extinguish heavy fire that consumed a vacant and boarded 2,353 square-foot one story residential duplex, the site of previous fires. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC5 E227 E261 E41 E52 E61 RA52 RA68 SO1 T27 T61; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#0831; 01:00PM; 645 N Gardner St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KCizHD; #Fairfax; *Address Corrected* to 645 North Gardner Street. 30 LAFD Firefighters assigned in offensive firefighting operations at a vacant and boarded one-story residential duplex, the site of a previous fire. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC5 E227 E261 E41 E52 E61 RA52 RA68 T27 T61; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0831; 12:50PM; 7475 W Melrose Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ryigY9; #Fairfax; *Address Tentative* PRELIM: Vacant one-story home, the site of a previous fire, well involved.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 5; BC5 E227 E261 E41 E52 E61 RA52 RA68 T27 T61; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0213; 03:55AM; 17619 W Rinaldi St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46xDrIy; #GranadaHills; 39 LAFD Firefighters took 43 minutes in defensive firefighting operations to extinguish flames in a vacant 1,715 square-foot two story home that was fully involved with fire on their arrival. No injury. Though the structure - heavily damaged by this fire, may have been formerly used for a marijuana grow operation, the specific cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E28 E287 E290 E8 E87 EM15 RA18 RA70 RA87 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0213; 03:12AM; 17619 W Rinaldi St; MAP: https://bit.ly/46xDrIy; #GranadaHills; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations at a vacant two story home fully involved with fire.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 CM40 CM42 E18 E275 E28 E287 E290 E8 E87 EM15 RA18 RA70 RA87 T75 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#0949; 03:00PM; 9627 N Noble Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46dtGzC; #NorthHills; On further inspection, it was determined that the two-story residence to the north did suffered some minor damage from the fire. No Injuries have been reported, and the fire cause remains under active investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E239 E287 E298 E39 E7 E81 RA7 RA87 T39 T87 T98; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0949; 02:30PM; 9627 N Noble Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/46dtGzC; #NorthHills; Address Corrected to the rear of 9627 Noble Avenue. 32 LAFD Firefighters took just 17 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a well involved 10' x 15' shed to the rear of one-story home, that contained an unspecified number of 55 gallon drums of a yet to be determined type oil. The fire was prevented from damaging a two-story residence to the north. No Injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E239 E287 E298 E39 E7 E81 RA7 RA87 T39 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey
